name: Darkness Muse
description:
This game was made in less than 72 hours for Ludum Dare 48.

Darkness Muse is a light bullet hell, where your health determines how far you can see. Dive deeper and deeper into the dark cave in search of your muse.

Best enjoyed in full screen.

Controls:
WASD : MOVE
Left click and hold: Shoot

Song Credit:
Dee Yan-Key , Angst,  https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Dee_Yan-Key/2020-1/angst, CC BY-NC 4.0
